markers.label: Old Ranger Note
markers.description: A faded parchment wedged into the bark of a dead pine.

markers.label: Unmarked Grave
markers.description: A shallow mound and a rusted sword hilt.

markers.label: Abandoned Camp
markers.description: Scattered coals and a broken kettle.

markers.label: Warden’s Watchtower
markers.description: An old wooden tower overlooking the bay.
